foxmosa-painter-content: Fill out the form http://bit.ly/joinmoztw right now and check 'Art Design' if you are interested in MozTW Community, and want to be one of Foxmosa painters, which enables you to promote projects from Mozilla and Firefox with your pen, such as Websites, Posters, Games and so on.
